modName: Light Studded Armor F - Darker Retex
summary: Light Studded Armor for Female - Retextured to be darker and converted all fur to leather.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the Skyrim vanilla light studded armor for the female. The fur has been swapped out for all leather. The leather overall is darker as well as the iron latches and attachments.


Demonstration images are of Lydia with the following mods to change her appearance. None of the files from these mods are included in this upload. You can find them here on the Nexus.

Better Females by Bella - Makeup version 2
Coolsims Hair Pack
Covereyes - eyes 2
Coverwomen - coverwomen look_1
Fountain of Youth - Beauty Project v1-5
No Dirty Bodies - Caucasian Female Races - Main file
HD body and face textures for females

Some changes to Lydia were made using the Skyrim NPC Editor v0_52
author: Falcon21

files.name: Light Studded Armor F Darker Retex v1
